column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We recently hosted our wedding brunch on a Saturday and booked the Front Lounge for 40 guests. The place was not very crowded and seemed like we have enough space for us. The food (we went for brunch buffet and picked Bosscat Burger Sliders
column2: Vegetable Omelet with spinach tomato and cheese
column3: Shrimp and Grits with sunny side up eggs and Bourbon Chocolate Silk Custard with sugar cookie
column4: candied pecans & whipped cream) the drinks (wine
column5: mimosa and beer) and the service were all great! All our guests enjoyed the venue and cocktail style brunch. We especially liked having a cocktails setup
column6: it enabled our guests to socialize and talk to each other more than table setup where people usually talk to ones around them.
